pkgmetadata.longdescription: Principal Component Analysis (PCA) Tool on Protein Expression Data // Analysis of protein expression data can be done through Principal Component Analysis (PCA), and this R package is designed to streamline the analysis. This package enables users to perform PCA and it generates biplot and scree plot for advanced graphical visualization. Optionally, it supports grouping/clustering visualization with PCA loadings and confidence ellipses. With this R package, researchers can quickly explore complex protein datasets, interpret variance contributions, and visualize sample clustering through intuitive biplots. For more details, see Jolliffe (2001) doi:10.1007/b98835, Gabriel (1971) doi:10.1093/biomet/58.3.453, Zhang et al. (2024) doi:10.1038/s41467-024-53239-9, and Anandan et al. (2022) doi:10.1038/s41598-022-07781-5.
